name: Tiny Worlds (Dikkop)
description:
This is a small game made for Ludum Dare 41, thought I share it here as well :)

The goal of the game is to hurl fireballs at the other planets, once they hit they turn orange and they are yours.

Conquer all planets to win.

WASD - pan camera

LMouse - Fire

RMouse - Select owned planet

MMouse - toggle helper lines

Enjoy!

Music by: http://www.jellevanaanholt.nl/
